thread.title: Ramya stumps Sanjay Manaktala
thread.title_full: Ramya stumps Sanjay Manaktala - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Ramya stumps Sanjay Manaktala
text:
It's usually very very difficult to get a standup comic to shut his gob.But that's what happened (at least for a record 60 seconds) to comedian Sanjay Manaktala at the Bengaluru Comedy Festival (which saw the likes of Radhika Vaz, Aditi Mittal and Biswa Kalyan Rath among others caus ing a laugh riot).
This is how it went: Manaktala, the `IT guy' who recently opened for Russell Brand, made a joke about the beleaguered Congress party. Then he asked if there were any Congress supporters in the audience. "Please raise your hands," he said. There were no takers. Then a hand went up. "What's your affiliation," asked Manaktala confidently. Pat came the reply: "I'm a member of Parliament." It was none other than Congress leader and actress Ramya. And to think that he was introduced to Ramya only a couple of weeks ago.
The diarist thinks that Manaktala almost gagged at his gaffe. Ramya, giggled.
